rules.title: before and after
rules.description: infer that two TemporalEntities are before and after one another
rules.rule: time:TemporalEntity(?a), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:TemporalEntity(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), lessThan(?t1, ?t2) -> time:before(?a, ?b)
